items.sentence: Do you think you\'ll ever move back to Boston?
I think you\'ve mistaken me for somebody else.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to pay his rent.
I\'m convinced my daughter will pass the exam.
Tom surrounds himself with like-minded people.
Tom takes a bath every day just before dinner.
Tom talked to himself as he washed the dishes.
I can barely make myself understood in French.
My wife and I have grown apart over the years.
I want you to call me back as soon as you can.
